alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 2:29PM EDT until June 08 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morgan County in central Indiana... Northwestern Johnson County in central Indiana... Southwestern Marion County in central Indiana... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mooresville, or 18 miles southwest of Indianapolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 240 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bargersville, Greenwood and Whiteland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Indiana.
